<snip>
I was young once, like you, and I asked all the same
questions you did. Beld (Grant V) was kind enough to
post some very detailed strategies and outlooks that I
still use to this day. If you only get one thing off
this list, make sure it's Beld's advice. Listen to him.
<snip>

Beld's advise has changed the way I look at HT. I did
use HT only as an "oh shit I'm gonna die!" panic button
until that HT email came out. Right now I am in
Lavastorm, and as a Troll that really bites when solo
for xp. I can really only take on a blue con there and
have enough HP to limp to a safe point and be OOM. I
only have a Tentacle Whip, so when fighting a Fire
Elemental I take a massive beating. I do max of 9 points
after a Siphon Strength, and 5 with Diseasee Cloud vs
their max of 23 per hit. Not kewl.
This is where Beld's advise has really helped. With my
regen, a blue elemental or a black drake is a possible
victory. I wait til it is at half life if I can, center
it in my view and hit the hotkey. I have yet to see it
not do full damage when used this way, and I have yet to
die this way as well.
In group, it has saved the life of my friends many
times. The casters go nuts on DD spells and won't let me
tank (I like tanking heh) since it frenzies on them.
When I notice they are in trouble (since I am watching
my Slam and Disease Cloud buttons to become available
again) I hit it and they frenzy on me instead. Then I
hit Taunt to keep them there while they regen. Very nice.
I no longer feel weak if I don't have HT available
either. I just pick my targets more carefully, and
position myself to where I am least likely to be
ambushed. I learned very quickly that the doors to
Najena have an Elemental, Drake and Fire Imp wander path
going across it. Now I pull them to the doorway of
Najena and battle it there. This is also because there
is a zone point right behind me if I get into trouble.

As for armor. I have Banded Cloak, Mantle, Helm, Tunic,
and Leggs. All the rest is Leather. I wield a FS2HS,
Tentacle Whip and a Parrying Dagger (ac 4) but am
looking for a cheap Chitton Shield. I have 2 Cut Throat
Rings to boost my Dex.

Last night just before I logged off the knight that
spawns in Lavastorm attacked me. KEWL I thought. I
conned him and he was blue. NP. I started to beat on him
and took him to half life. I almost used HT but
remembered he was a Paladin and waited. Sure enough I
saw that "feels a healing touch" message. pound, pound,
pound back down to 1/2 kewl. Then an elemental joins
in. damn. HT the knight, he dies. I loot the testimony
and run to Najena zone. 3 bubs of health left and no
suprises on the other side. Now what? I couldn't find
the Necro that starts the quest for that knight, or if I
did he wouldn't give the [phrase]. I know it gives you
a random Damask Item, but I don't know if I can do the
quest as a Troll SK. I will be looking on Alkazam's
site today for that info. :) Can't put it in the bank
either. :(

I started my SK with the Evil Knight in mind. But now
that I am playing him, he isn't evil. I help out
everyone. I don't do the race-war thing, or the Paladins
of Marr must die! Except that one in Lavastorm, heh. I
just like the abilities.

Keep that mail flowing!

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
